content: साप्तपद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (दी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) साप्तपदीन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. V. 2. 22</ls>] Formed by walking together seven steps, or by talking together seven words; यतः सतां संनतगात्रि संगतं मनीषिभिः साप्तपदीनमुच्यते <ls>Ku. 5. 39</ls> (where the latter sense appears better); <ls>Pt. 2. 43</ls>, <ls n="Pt.">4. 103.</ls> --दं, --नं {@--1@} Circumambulation of the nuptial fire by the bride and bridegroom in seven steps (which makes the marriage tie irrevocable). {@--2@} Friendship, intimacy.
